title: Playoff Push, NBA Title Odds, Russell Westbrook | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Playoff Push, NBA Title Odds, Russell Westbrook | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
The final week of the NBA regular season is here. The boys discuss the upcoming matchups as teams make their final pushes for playoff seeding. Plus, they examine the NBA title favorites as we head into the playoffs and talk Russell Westbrook's history making night.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
